scripts.package: source env.sh && aws s3 sync ./static s3://${S3_BUCKET_NAME} && cd src && aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file ../packaged-template.yaml --s3-bucket ${S3_BUCKET_NAME}
scripts.deploy: source env.sh && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-template.yaml  --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --stack-name ${CLOUDFORMATION_STACK_NAME}
